event_description: In the whimsical nation of [Nation Name], an unexpected turn of events has led to a government shutdown like no other. It all began when the Minister of Silly Walks proposed a new law that required all government officials to incorporate a silly walk into their daily commutes around the capital. While some saw this as a lighthearted way to boost morale, others decried it as a blatant waste of time and taxpayer money. As tensions escalate, the government finds itself at a standstill, with officials unable to agree on the seriousness of incorporating absurdity into governance.

event_options.option_description: Embrace the silliness! Let's make the silly walk mandatory for all government officials, with special awards for the most creative walks. Laughter is the best medicine for a functioning government!
event_options.option_outcome: The streets of the capital are filled with laughter as officials strut their stuff with elaborate silly walks. The nation gains a reputation for its unique approach to governance.

event_options.option_description: This is a mockery of governance! We must end this frivolity and focus on serious matters. Enforce a strict ban on silly walks in government areas to restore respect for our institutions.
event_options.option_outcome: Officials begrudgingly abandon their silly walks, leading to a return to a more solemn atmosphere in government buildings. The nation's reputation for quirky governance takes a hit, but efficiency sees a slight increase.

event_options.option_description: Let's compromise. Allow government officials the choice to incorporate a silly walk into their routine, but only during designated break times. Balance humor with productivity to keep the government moving.
event_options.option_outcome: Government employees embrace the compromise, showcasing their silly walks during breaks and fostering a light-hearted atmosphere without compromising on work efficiency.

event_options.option_description: Focus on the real issues at hand. Implement a temporary government shutdown until both sides can come to a reasonable agreement on the role of silliness in governance.
event_options.option_outcome: The nation experiences a temporary government paralysis, with public services halted until officials reach a consensus. The populace is divided on the effectiveness of this drastic measure.
